import React,{useContext} from 'react' import { AiOutlinePlus, AiOutlineMinus, AiFillDelete } from 'react-icons/ai' import { global_props } from '../App' const Item = ({id,img,title,description,price,amount}) => { const {removeItem,increment} = useContext(global_props) return ( <>

{title}

{description}

increment(id)} className="fas fa-plus add" />

{price}â‚¹

removeItem(id)} />
) } export default Item
